trans-unit.source: $BLACKONWHITE and $WHITEONBLACK are converted to $COLORONCOLOR for the _WinAPI_TransparentBlt() function.

seg-source.mrk: $BLACKONWHITE and $WHITEONBLACK are converted to $COLORONCOLOR for the _WinAPI_TransparentBlt() function.

target.mrk: $BLACKONWHITE and $WHITEONBLACK are converted to $COLORONCOLOR for the _WinAPI_TransparentBlt() function.

trans-unit.source: This function supports all formats of source bitmaps. However, for 32 bpp bitmaps, it just copies the alpha

However, for 32 bpp bitmaps, it just copies the alpha

target.mrk: This function supports all formats of source bitmaps.
However, for 32 bpp bitmaps, it just copies the alpha

trans-unit.source: value over. Use _WinAPI_AlphaBlend() to specify 32 bits-per-pixel bitmaps with transparency.
